CHAT.comment: JAMES ALEXANDER, DIRECTOR, ALABAMA DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY, ET AL., Petitioners v. MARTHA SANDOVAL, INDIVIDUALLY AND ON BEHALF OF ALL OTHERS SIMILARLY SITUATED
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY S. SUTTON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ERIC SCHNAPPER ON BEHALF OF THE PRIVATE RESPONDENTS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF SETH P. WAXMAN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT UNITED STATES
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY S. SUTTON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 10:57 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
